ComicInfo.Title: Beware of…Bruttu; The New Look; The Anatomy of a Nightmare!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Beware of…Bruttu: An often bullied scientist accidentally transforms himself into a monster, and is attacked when he can’t make himself understood. In his new form he discovers that the girl he’d thought out of his league really loves him, and manages to make himself human again.
The New Look: The Devil grants the wish of an ugly man to have a new handsome face by grafting it onto the back of his head.
The Anatomy of a Nightmare!: A science fiction writer is stuck, so he takes some pills, hoping a nightmare will inspire him. He dreams of horrible red-eyed aliens, but is disappointed, since that's only his own dull world.
